page.title: 19A Day in a Child's Life
page.content: I woke up this morning to find that my German Measles spots had gone. I went downstairs to ask my Mum if I could go to school but she said perhaps tomorrow. I am so bored staying at home. But it was nice to be able to play with my Great Shape Barbie Doll which Mum and Dad bought for me for doimg well in my ballet exam. My Mum played draughts with me and that wasn't much fun and she beat me. My teacher sent some books home to read, so I sat down after lunch and I read two of them. Soon it was time for my brother to come home from school, but he didn't want to play with me, he wanted to play with his friends. Still Dad will be home soon and tomorrow I can go to school. So I will be able to take part in my classes Family Assembly, after all.
